body.section:
Ceph is an open source, scalable, software-defined storage (SDS) platform that provides block and object storage with unified management.
The Ceph Storage Solution provides an unified, scalable, and stable storage solution for the management of the HPE Helion OpenStack Volume Storage (Cinder persistent Volumes) service. body.note: Ceph upgrade is a built-in, integral part of the HPE Helion Lifecycle Management upgrade, and is in line with rest of the supported services. In , the supported version of Ceph is Firefly 0.80.7. In upcoming releases, new versions of Ceph will be supported and the cluster can be upgraded to new releases. You should not use other releases of Ceph (for example, Firefly 0.80.10) and run Ceph upgrade verbs to upgrade the cluster. Doing this might cause a cluster stability issue.
